title: Sweet Surrender with the Millionaire
description: Willow Landon is starting a new life. She's determined to prove herself as an independent woman, having escaped a controlling relationship. She certainly doesn't need help from Morgan Wright, her arrogant neighbor! Morgan may have movie-star good looks, own a country estate and have millions in the bank—but she's not interested.Morgan is also determined—to show Willow just how a lady should be treated….
author: Helen Brooks
